roleset.name: to leave lasting signs of damage on (a person), leaving lasting signs of damage
roleset.note: SCAR-V NOTES: Frame by Perryn. Member of VNcls image_impression-25.1. (from scar.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: However , people may not know that today another group of Chinese people in a foreign land are still evoking the same kind of touching story , treating the war wounds of battle - scarred Cambodia , and paving a road to prosperity .
